name: predictive-services-daily-wims-feed
description: Data feed for National Predictive Services program
author: Joshua Clark

scripts.dry-run: export AWS_PROFILE=management-admin && export AWS_SDK_LOAD_CONFIG=1 && serverless invoke local --function cronHandler --data '{"dry_run": "True"}'
scripts.local-sync: export AWS_PROFILE=management-admin && export AWS_SDK_LOAD_CONFIG=1 && serverless invoke local --function cronHandler
